
# ChangeLog

## v7.0.5
* NODE-4698: Types fix & startuptime available & push nodejs app init time metrics into sherlockio

## v7.0.4
* Changes for Moving away from runtime certs to static certs for Performance optimization

## v7.0.1
* Added bootstrapModule class to use in app-version-keeper

## v7.0.0
* NODE-4073: Change bootstrap logic to self-module check for platform modules

## v6.28.0
* NODE-4106: Added startup logs

## v6.26.1
* NODE-4060: Added dnscache TTL runtime configuration via env variable for CPDLC.

## v6.26.0
* Upgraded to @ebay/opentelemetry-ebay@^2.1.0 and @ebay/service-instruments-ebay@^4.26.0 that has @ebay/opentelemetry-ebay@^2.1.0 upgrade as well, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3043

## v6.25.0
* Switched moment-perf-fix back to moment as they have already picked up the fix, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3924
* Fix reference: https://github.com/moment/moment/pull/5331

## v6.24.0
* Updated Prometheus & Validate Internals for supporting Exemplers, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3703

## v6.22.0
* Added: Bootstrap @ebay/opentelemetry-ebay/middleware and @ebay/prometheus-ebay/middleware, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3779

## v6.21.0
* Upgrade to @ebay/tracking-ebay@5.0.0-xs-rc.4

## v6.20.1
* Fixed pipeline metrics ebay naming convention

## v6.20.0
* Enabled opentrace back, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3736

## v6.19.0
* Add support for async middleware factory, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3043

## v6.18.0
* Typescript support for service-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3673

## v6.17.3
* Disabled opentelemtry for the time being, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3455

## v6.17.2
* upgraded tracking-ebay

## v6.17.1
* minor fixes for middleware order

## v6.15.1
* Added ebay root certs by default to non-service-client https calls, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3040

## v6.15.0
* Added trust-fabric middleware for validing TF token for all incoming service call.
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2797

## v6.14.0
* Upgraded to tracking-ebay@5.0.0-xs-rc.1, which is a replacement for github link which was a security issue.

## v6.13.4
* Upgrade dependencies to the latest

## v6.13.3
* Upgrade prometheus to 2.x

## v6.13.2
* Upgraded validate-internals-ebay to 5.x

## v6.13.1
* Fixed: should suppress "powered by Express", https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2483

## v6.13.0
* Added components status for consumer per https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2347

## v6.12.0
* Updated bootstrap logic to map one file to the other, useful for temporary patches when public module has not been released
* Added bootstrap mapping for moment to moment-perf-fix

## v6.11.0
* Added support for controller middleware handlers per https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2427

## v6.10.2
* Fixed: should print correct service name during start up, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2332

## v6.10.1
* Picked up cal fix related to memory spikes

## v6.10.0
* Added openapi-context-ebay as part of the context provider logic (context logic was extracted from openapi-ebay module into its own module openapi-context-ebay.)

## v6.9.0
* moved runtime context out to [runtime-context-ebat](https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/runtime-context-ebay)

## v6.8.0
* Upgraded commons-ebay to 5.x

## v6.7.0
* Upgraded commons-ebay to 5.x

## v6.6.1
* Fixed bootstrap logic

## v6.6.0
* Should support injected function middleware

## v6.5.0
* Added DNS cache similar to one used in FE node.js stack.

## v6.4.1
* Added req.route.config.path attribute to allow prometheus calculate metrcis based on path parameter

## v6.4.0
* Added route attributes (expSvcRequest, moduleProviderRequest) to openapi schema and exposed them via req.route.config context

## v6.3.3
* Security fix for prototype poisoning https://hueniverse.com/a-tale-of-prototype-poisoning-2610fa170061

## v6.3.2
* Domain security fix to prevent JSON serialization of domain structures

## v6.3.1
* Added `@ebay/prometheus-ebay` to middleware and bootstrap

## v6.3.0
* Corrected result annotations per latest change in openapi-ebay@2.5.0

## v6.3.0
* Added context support to provide decoupling of bisness logic via context with everything connected via runtime context.

## v6.2.1
* Spec change for https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/SVCSPLAT-4986

## v6.2.0
* Implemented: Add support for code-generation of operationId and support of metadata extension, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/SVCSPLAT-4986

## v6.1.1
* Added oauth-ebay middleware for oauth support in service calls

## v6.1.0
* Upgrade to openapi-ebay and openapi-ref-resolver-ebay to support ebay way of referencing external types in openapi contract

## v6.0.3
* Fixed: should start workers channels for hystrix, CPU profile, heapdump and troubleshooting page

## v6.0.2
* Removed unused experience-types-ebay module

## v6.0.0
* OpneAPI 3.0 support

## v5.0.1
* Corrected trace logging in response

## v5.0.0
* Major nodejs service release with experien ceservice support

## v4.0.1
* Removed unused module

## v4.0.0
* Upgraded to 4.x

## v0.1.1
* Upgraded dependencies

## v0.1.0
* Initial release
